thread.title: Rebecca Stewart - Fort Worth, TX
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Rebecca Stewart - Fort Worth, TX

author: Rebecca Stewart - Fort Worth, TX
title: Rebecca Stewart - Fort Worth, TX
text: I called SelectQuote: because I wanted to see if I could lower my home and auto insurance premiums. I did not want to spend hours comparing rates with other companies. The agent, Jeff Tibbitts, took my call. He was professional, polite and patient. He found two options that could work for me and then we discussed the pros and cons of each. He never rushed to finish the call and explained everything thoroughly. In the end, I saved over $1500.00 on my home and auto insurance. It was a great experience all around.
